ValidationRule.description: Solution Approval must be after Proof Reading Date (if populated). Otherwise must be after Process Start Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(Solution_Approval_Date__c)), IF(ISBLANK(Proof_Reading_Date__c), Solution_Approval_Date__c < Bid__r.Bid_Start_Date__c, Solution_Approval_Date__c < Proof_Reading_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Solution Approval Date cannot be before Process Start Date or Proof Reading Date
